<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// resources (i.e. BufferSize=1) is consumed.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><span class="doxyHighlight">         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Unexpected internal state found!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Don&#39;t add a zero-latency instruction to the Ready queue.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A zero-latency instruction doesn&#39;t consume any scheduler resources. That is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// because it doesn&#39;t need to be executed, and it is often removed at register</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// renaming stage. For example, register-register moves are often optimized at</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// register renaming stage by simply updating register aliases. On some</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// targets, zero-idiom instructions (for example: a xor that clears the value</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of a register) are treated specially, and are often eliminated at register</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// renaming stage.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/scheduler/#ab8e4d85b5f90fc2efe108d87e78e9a87">mustIssueImmediately</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/legalizer-cpp/#a05ab4853f7153e537774d02580e761ec">IR</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
